targets.query: SELECT last("State") FROM "DataCore_Servers" WHERE ("objectname" = 'DataCore Servers' AND "host" =~ /^$DataCore_Servers$/)

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES WITH KEY = "host" WHERE "objectname" = 'DataCore Servers'
list.label: DataCore Servers
list.name: DataCore_Servers
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES WITH KEY = "host" WHERE "objectname" = 'DataCore Servers'

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES WITH KEY = "instance" WHERE "objectname" = 'DataCore Virtual disks' and "instance" !~ /Logstore/
list.label: DataCore Virtual Disks
list.name: DataCore_Virtual_Disks
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES WITH KEY = "instance" WHERE "objectname" = 'DataCore Virtual disks' and "instance" !~ /Logstore/

list.label: DataCore Disk Pools
list.name: DataCore_Disk_pools
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES WITH KEY = "instance" WHERE "objectname" = 'DataCore Disk pools'

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES WITH KEY = "instance" WHERE "objectname" = 'DataCore Physical disk' and "Type" = '4'
list.label: DataCore Physical Disk
list.name: DataCore_Physical_Disks
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES WITH KEY = "instance" WHERE "objectname" = 'DataCore Physical disk' and "Type" = '4'

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES WITH KEY = "instance" WHERE "objectname" = 'DataCore SCSI ports' and ("PortRole" = '1' or "PortRole" = '2' or "PortRole" = '4' )
list.label: DataCore SCSI Ports
list.name: DataCore_SCSI_Ports
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES WITH KEY = "instance" WHERE "objectname" = 'DataCore SCSI ports' and ("PortRole" = '1' or "PortRole" = '2' or "PortRole" = '4' )
